name: 葉采青
objective: 本課程旨在引導學生熟悉詩歌、小說、及戲劇等文學作品之各種讀法。學生將於本課程裡研究諸如人物、主角、反派角色、場景、旁白、獨白、矛盾修辭法、誇張修辭法等文學及修辭術語。此外，學生亦將學習欣賞諸如明喻、暗喻、意象、象徵、符號等各種比喻的語文用法。藉此，學生將可提昇其對文學語言複雜特性的敏感度。
schedule:
week 1.　　Orientation; “Why the Novel Matters,” D.H. Lawrence
week 2.   Ernest Hemingway, “Hills Like White Elephants” (1927)
week 3.　　Kate Chopin, “The Story of an Hour” (1891)
week 4.　　James Joyce, “Araby” (1914)
week 5.　　“Araby”; William Faulkner, “A Rose for Emily” (1930)
week 6.   “A Rose for Emily”
week 7.　　Spring break; “A Rose for Emily” and critical essays
week 8.   William Blake, “The Chimney Sweeper” (from Songs of Innocence, 1789), “The Chimney Sweeper” (from Songs of Experience)
Elizabeth Barrett Browning, “How Do I Love Thee?” (1850)
Anne Bradstreet, “To My Dear and Loving Husband” (1678)
week 9.   Mid-term week
week 10.  Sherwood Anderson, “Mother” (1919)
week 11. “Mother”; Flannery O’Connor, “Good Country People”
week 12. “Good Country People”
week 13.　　 Shirley Jackson, “The Lottery” (1948)
week 14.　　“The Lottery”; Franz Kafka, “A Hunger Artist” (1924)
week 15.　　“A Hunger Artist”
week 16.  “A Hunger Artist”
week 17.   Review
week 18.　　 Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation: 15%
Assignment: 20%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 35%
